title: House for sale in Nawala
details:
* Two story 4 bedroom house for sale in nawala, 3 washrooms, 7.5 perches land, 1600 Sq, A/C, hot water, pantry, maids quarters, 20 feet access road, CCTV. 100 meters to nawala main road.

* Price- 39 million, selling for highest offer.

* Inspection only through Appointment! Brokers will not be entertained!
